intro: This Product User Manual provides a comprehensive overview of the Copernicus Land Monitoring Service (CLMS) N2K product, a detailed Land Cover/Land Use (LC/LU) dataset focused on grassland-rich Natura 2000 sites across Europe. Covering the years 2006, 2012, and 2018, the manual elucidates the product's characteristics, methodology, and potential applications in assessing habitat conservation status. It details the use of high-resolution satellite data, the harmonised classification system, quality assessment procedures, and technical specifications relevant for users aiming to leverage this valuable resource for environmental monitoring and policy support.
